trans-unit.source: A lexer and codec to work with LaTeX code in Python.
trans-unit.target: 一个在Python中使用LaTeX代码的词典和编解码器。

trans-unit.source: Given the numerous and changing packages providing such LaTeX commands, the codec will never be complete, and new translations of unrecognized unicode or unrecognized LaTeX symbols are always welcome.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于提供此类LaTeX命令的软件包众多且不断变化,该编解码器永远不会完整,而且欢迎对未识别的unicode或未识别的LaTeX符号进行新的翻译。

trans-unit.source: In addition, comments are dropped (including the final newline that marks the end of a comment), paragraphs are canonicalized into double newlines, and other newlines are left as is. Spacing after LaTeX commands is also canonicalized.
trans-unit.target: 此外,注释被删除(包括标志注释结束的最后一个换行),段落被规范化为双换行,其他换行则保持原样。LaTeX命令后的间距也被规范化。

trans-unit.source: The codec provides a convenient way of going between text written in LaTeX and unicode. Since it is not a LaTeX compiler, it is more appropriate for short chunks of text, such as a paragraph or the values of a BibTeX entry, and it is not appropriate for a full LaTeX document. In particular, its behavior on the LaTeX commands that do not simply select characters is intended to allow the unicode representation to be understandable by a human reader, but is not canonical and may require hand tuning to produce the desired effect.
trans-unit.target: 该编解码器提供了一种在LaTeX和unicode文本之间转换的便捷方式。由于它不是 LaTeX 编译器,因此它更适合于短块文本,如一段文字或 BibTeX 条目的值,而不适合于完整的 LaTeX 文档。特别是,它在LaTeX命令上的行为不是简单地选择字符,而是为了让人类读者能够理解unicode的表示,但不是规范的,可能需要手工调整才能产生所需的效果。

trans-unit.source: The decoder does a best effort to replace LaTeX commands that select characters with the unicode for the character they are selecting. For example,
trans-unit.target: 解码器尽最大努力将选择字符的LaTeX命令替换为所选字符的unicode。例如

trans-unit.source: The encoder does a best effort to replace unicode characters outside of the range used as LaTeX input (ascii by default) with a LaTeX command that selects the character. More technically, the unicode code point is replaced by a LaTeX command that selects a glyph that reasonably represents the code point. Unicode characters with special uses in LaTeX are replaced by their LaTeX equivalents. For example,
trans-unit.target: 编码器会尽最大努力将LaTeX输入范围之外的unicode字符(默认为ascii)替换为选择该字符的LaTeX命令。更技术地讲,unicode码点由LaTeX命令替换,该命令选择一个合理代表码点的字形。在LaTeX中具有特殊用途的Unicode字符被它们的LaTeX等价物所取代。例如

trans-unit.source: When decoding, LaTeX commands not directly selecting characters (for example, macros and formatting commands) are passed through unchanged. The same happens for LaTeX commands that select characters but are not yet recognized by the codec. Either case can result in a hybrid unicode string in which some characters are understood as literally the character and others as parts of unexpanded commands. Consequently, at times, backslashes will be left intact for denoting the start of a potentially unrecognized control sequence.
trans-unit.target: 解码时,不直接选择字符的 LaTeX 命令(例如,宏和格式化命令)将保持不变地通过。同样的情况也发生在选择字符但尚未被解码器识别的LaTeX命令上。这两种情况都可能导致混合单码字符串,其中一些字符被理解为字面上的字符,而其他字符则被理解为未展开的命令的一部分。因此,有时,反斜杠将被完整地保留下来,以表示一个潜在的未识别的控制序列的开始。
